name: New York Standard U-Lock
summary: Maximum protection for your e-ride! The Kryptonite New York Standard u-lock was built with the toughest cities in mind. Combining thick hardened steel with patented deadbolt technology, the New York is up for the challenge.

name: Keeper U-Lock
summary: Ultimate security at an affordable price. The Kryptonite Keeper is an impressive u-lock that will keep your prized e-ride safe. A hardened shackle and anti-theft deadbolt are just some of the reasons we love the Keeper.

name: 1000 Front Light
summary: This is a LED cycling light with a brightness of 1,000 lumens. It is compact and durable. Includes power pack battery and charging cable.

name: Pro Smart
summary: This lightweight and durable Max 75 lumens / 20 hour runtime in Flash mode rear light comes with a new 400 mAh battery, has Wide angle optics with 270° visibility for maximum safety, and is aero and round seat post compatible. Offers IPX7 water resistance.

name: Sport III Bike Pump
summary: The new JoeBlow® III continues the tradition of setting the benchmark for floor pump durability and performance, while ushering in upgrades with an enlarged 3” chronograph inspired gauge and new hammer style TwinHead® DX pump head. A durable steel barrel and base as well as ergonomic padded handle make inflating tires a breeze.
